void DzPickStyle::setPickingMode ( DzDrawStyle::PickingMode  mode  ) 

Sets the picking mode for the draw style

Parameters:
mode The picking mode to use
void DzPickStyle::setSelectionMapsEnabled ( bool  onOff  ) 

Sets whether selection maps are enabled for node picking drawing operations, invalid for other types of drawing operations. By default, selection maps are enabled.

Parameters:
onOff If true, selection maps are enabled, if false, selection maps are disabled.
